infoSource.description: Specifies the origin of the interface data collected. values: domain, guest-agent, or both

interfaceName.description: The interface name inside the Virtual Machine

ipAddress.description: IP address of a Virtual Machine interface. It is always the first item of IPs

ipAddresses.description: List of all IP addresses of a Virtual Machine interface

mac.description: Hardware address of a Virtual Machine interface

name.description: Name of the interface, corresponds to name of the network assigned to the interface

queueCount.description: Specifies how many queues are allocated by MultiQueue
